step_feedback.feedback: Your arm was mostly straight overhead, but there was some slight bending at the elbow. Try to extend it fully to feel the resistance.
You made a good fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles. Keep up the strong contraction.
You opened your hand and relaxed your muscles while exhaling. This is great for promoting fluid flow.
You successfully visualized fluid being pumped out. This mental focus is a key part of the exercise.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm fully extended overhead and make a strong fist as you breathe in. Then, open your hand wide as you breathe out to help move fluid.
